items.summary: Fix backend onboarding so a normal user completing onboarding with a valid invite token can be assigned the `#user` role without requiring admin privileges, and without trapping with the error `Unauthorized: Only admins can assign user roles`. Keep the existing behavior for the allowlisted first-admin claim (allowlisted principal can complete onboarding with an empty token).

Update the frontend onboarding error handling so that if the backend still returns an authorization-related onboarding failure, the onboarding UI shows a clear English message explaining registration could not be completed (without mentioning admin role assignment), and does not display the raw backend error string to end users.
